channel.title: SFoL 32: Siege on Xed 2 (version 3.0) - Green Kraken Victory
channel.description:
## all aboard. Hosted by Pug and Co-Hosted by HairyTimeMan
### Rules
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515
### Gameplay Days will be 3 days/72 hours long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 1 day/24 hours long Actions are done through class DMs Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Discord server. This is a day and night chat. Bard may speak with their musical network through a separate Discord server. When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it. There are no Blue Dragon classes, Green Kraken is the new good faction. Unseen, Cult and Neutrals remain the same except converts and a new feature known as plunder abilities. Plunder abilities are a one time ability that must be granted to the player by the Captain or the Plunder Organiser/Converted PO. These abils will be on the classcard. Bleeding is not present. # Fool is disabled
Non Unique Class Cap is 2
## Class Thread: https://forum.imperium42.com/t/siege-on-xed-sfol-3-0-main-thread/63502?u=pug
### Executions To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" Once a player is up. You may vote to execute or pardon. **NO ABSTAINING MARGARET** Captain may also decide to force execute or pardon the target in this time Executions end the day.
### Feedback Mininal feedback IS in play here except there is one minor rule. > *You were poisoned and will die in 2 nights* > *You were killed last night* > *You could not convert [x] > *any investigative feedback.*
Slept peacefully feedback will not be sent for time reasons
### Journals Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
### To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
### Rolelist: **Captain [color=springgreen]Good[/color] 65% | [color=purple]Evil [/color] / [color=darkred]Devout[/color] 35%** **[color=purple]Mastermind[/color]/[color=darkred]Cult Leader[/color]** **[color=purple]Assassin[/color]/[color=darkred]Random Cult[/color]** **[color=springgreen]First Mate[/color]** **[color=springgreen]Private Investigator/Stealthy[/color]** **[color=springgreen]Green Kraken Support[/color]** **[color=springgreen]Green Kraken Investigator[/color]** **[color=springgreen]Green Kraken Offensive[/color]** **[color=springgreen]Green Kraken Social[/color]** **[color=springgreen]Random Green Kraken[/color]** **[color=springgreen]Random Green Kraken [/color]** **[color=springgreen]Random Green Kraken [/color]** **[color=springgreen]Random Green Kraken[/color] / [color=grey]Neutral Non-Killer[/color]** **[color=springgreen]Random Green Kraken[/color] / [color=grey]Neutral Non-Killer[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral Killer[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral Non-Killer[/color]**
### Players: 1. **Captain :skull_and_crossbones:** 2. **Squid** 3. **Luxy** 4. **Margaret** 5. **Livicus** 6. **Successful Lynch Marl** (its a first) 8. **overthebin** 9. **Dead Meme-sky** 10. **PKR** 12. **GamerPoke** 13. **Soulshade55r** 14. **Twil1ght** 16. **Insanierror**
### Backups: 1. Sam17z 2. Solic 3. Boss110
### Spectators: Sarun
### Timestamps: [Day 3](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-32-siege-on-xed-2-version-3-0-day-3-suicide-of-the-mind-13-16/71828/1014?u=pug)
### Graveyard: **MaximusPrime - [color=purple]The Assassin[/color] - Executed Day 2** **techwolves - [color=springgreen]The Bard[/color] - Killed Night 2** **Firekitten - [color=purple]The Mastermind[/color] - Suicided Day 3**

item.dc:creator: Marcus_Doodalee
item.description:
But now your one time Neutral fake-claim is used up. Now you’re just going to get PLed whenever you claim neutral lol

At least you know what to do in your fool/jester games

Read full topic

item.title: SFoL 32: Siege on Xed 2 (version 3.0) - Green Kraken Victory
item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
Technically if the check is a tracker rather than a watcher you can also claim something like a CW or a Butler and state that you did visit the dead player, but brush it off by saying you used barrier on them or you occupied them.

But if you got caught as the only visit to the dead player, you don’t really have any other recourse other than claiming it’s a Possessor game or thunderdoming your accuser, and even then you’ll still die.

Read full topic
